summary: Standalone follower mod and Elisif Replacer mod, Used Pure Skin Texture and many beauty mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=https://flic.kr/p/Gv7Jk7][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1464/26583762172_1f9b2347bf_c.jpg[/img]
[/url][color=#ff7700][size=5]
Alice the Hermit[/size][/color][/center][size=3]          Her existence is Blue Palace's secret.  She is Elisif's substitute. [/size]
[size=3]          Empire prepared for natural disasters and Stormcloak's Any attack.[/size]
[size=3]          If Elisif dead(cause disease or assassination), Alice will be Elisif. [/size]
[size=3]          Of course, it is just doll of Empire.[/size]
[size=3]          She wants, somebody help her.[/size]

[size=3]          Location : Pelagius wing  [/size]

[size=3]          Class : Sorcerer[/size]
[size=3]          Race : Nord[/size]
[size=3]          Height : 1.00[/size]
[size=3]          Weight : 50[/size]

[size=3]          Spell[/size]
[size=3]          Lightning Cloak[/size]
[size=3]          Chain Lightning[/size]
[size=3]          Lightning Bolt[/size]
[size=3]          Fast Healing(self)[/size]

[size=3]          Perk[/size]
[size=3]          Destruction Master[/size]
[size=3]          Restoration Export[/size]
[size=3]          Storm Mastery[/size]
[size=3]          Respite[/size]
[size=3]          Mage Armor[/size]
[size=3]          Light Foot[/size]
[size=3]          Recovery[/size]
[size=3]          [/size]
[size=3]          [/size][size=2]Thanks Vatiwah![/size][size=3]   [/size]

            Thanks DonProtein![size=3]
[/size]            [youtube]Y3lhmbvOLg0[/youtube]

[center][size=5][color=#ff0000]i.Required[/color]
[/size][size=4]This Mod is standalone.
1.9.32 Version Skyrim.

[/size][color=#ff0000][size=5]ii.Recommend[/size][/color]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]This Mod is compatible with[/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT[/url].
(Load My mod after any follower control mod's esp.)
